titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Curtze-Stiftung Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

did.unittitle: Catalog des Bibliothek des ??? Professor Maximilian Curtze du Thorn- Small Booklet (This appears to be a list of primarily mathematics and astronomy books owned by Professor Curtze. Book titles are in French, German, Italian, and, Latin) Manuscripts List 1 1868- Contains letter in French and Manuscript in Latin -Bound
Manuscripts List 1 1868- Contains letter in French, notes in French, and essay in Latin -Bound Manuscripts List II 1868- Contains letter in French and essay in Latin—Bound

Manuscripts List III 1868- Contains Essays in German and Latin, Letters in German, Italian and French, Notes in French and Latin-Bound Manuscripts List IV 1868- Contains letter in Italian and essay in Italian-Bound Manuscripts List V 1868- Contains letters in German and French, Essays in Latin and notes in Latin and French-Bound
